name: ghost-high-fiver

scripts.zip: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && pushd dist/ && zip -X -r game.zip index.html *.png *.svg *.js && ls -lah game.zip && echo $(echo "13312 - $(wc -c < game.zip)" | bc) bytes remain
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && gh-pages -d dist/

//browserslist: Just to prevent parcel from causing babel to transpile anything and injecting regenerator runtime. Typescript already handles this.
